mapper.select:
WITH DEPOSITOS AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY FTN_ID_BANCO, FCN_ID_TIPO_DOCUMENTO ORDER BY FTD_FEH_CRE DESC) ROW_NUMBER_COLUM, A.* FROM PROCESOS.TTAFORECA_REINT_CORREGIDOS A),
CORREGIDOS AS ( SELECT DISTINCT ROW_NUMBER_COLUM, FTN_ID_BANCO, FTN_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL_ORIG, FTN_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL_CORREG, 1 AS FTN_ESTATUS_IDC FROM DEPOSITOS WHERE ROW_NUMBER_COLUM = 1 AND FCN_ID_TIPO_DOCUMENTO NOT IN (0) )
SELECT
BANCOS . FTN_ID_BANCO AS COLUMM_ID_BANCO, COALESCE(CORREGIDOS.FTN_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL_CORREG, BANCOS . FTN_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL) AS COLUMN_CUENTA_INDIVIDUAL, BANCOS . FTD_FEH_DEPOSITO AS COLUMN_FECHA_DEPOSITO, CATBAN . FCC_VALOR AS COLUMN_BANCO, BANCOS . FTN_REF_CUENTA AS COLUMN_REFERENCIA, BANCOS . FTN_IMPORTE AS COLUMN_IMPORTE, CATSBC . FCC_DESC AS COLUMN_MEDIO_DEPOSITO, CATSBC . FCC_VALOR AS COLUMN_ESTATUS_DESPOSITO, BANCOS . FTN_REF_SUBCTA_APOVOL AS COLUMN_CONCEPTO, TO_NUMBER(BANCOS . FTC_REFERENCIA_AMPLIADA) AS COLUMN_CONVENIO
FROM PROFAPOVOL . TTAFOAVOL_BANCOS BANCOS
LEFT JOIN CORREGIDOS ON BANCOS . FTN_ID_BANCO = CORREGIDOS.FTN_ID_BANCO INNER JOIN CIERREN . TCCRXGRAL_CAT_CATALOGO CATBAN ON BANCOS . FTN_CVE_BANCO = CATBAN . FCN_ID_CAT_CATALOGO AND CATBAN . FCN_ID_TIPO_CAT = 47 AND CATBAN . FCB_VIGENCIA = 1 INNER JOIN CIERREN . TCCRXGRAL_CAT_CATALOGO CATSBC ON BANCOS . FTN_IND_SBC = CATSBC . FCN_ID_CAT_CATALOGO AND CATSBC . FCN_ID_TIPO_CAT = 63 AND CATSBC . FCB_VIGENCIA = 1
AND FTN_REF_SUBCTA_APOVOL = 57822 /*AND FTN_IND_SBC IN (590,591,592,593)*/
AND FTN_REF_SUBCTA_APOVOL = 57822 /*AND FTN_IND_SBC IN (590,591,592,593)*/
AND COALESCE(CORREGIDOS.FTN_ESTATUS_IDC,BANCOS.FTN_ESTATUS_IDC) = #{estatusIDC,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND TRUNC(BANCOS . FTD_FEH_DEPOSITO) BETWEEN TRUNC(#{fechaInicio,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) AND TRUNC(#{fechaFinal,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
AND TRIM(CATBAN . FCC_VALOR) = TRIM(#{banco,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND TRIM(BANCOS . FTN_REF_CUENTA) = TRIM(#{referencia,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
ORDER BY COLUMN_FECHA_DEPOSITO DESC

SELECT
TRIM(CTAINDIV.FTN_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL) AS COLUMN_CUENTA_INDIVIDUAL, TRIM(CTAINDIV.FTC_NOMBRE) AS COLUMN_NOMBRE, TRIM(CTAINDIV.FTC_AP_PATERNO) AS COLUMN_APELLIDO_PATERNO, TRIM(CTAINDIV.FTC_AP_MATERNO) AS COLUMN_APELLIDO_MATERNO, TRIM(CTAINDIV.FTC_CORREO_ELEC) AS COLUMN_CORREO, COALESCE(COALESCE(COALESCE(CTAINDIV.FTC_TEL_PREFERENTE,CTAINDIV.FTN_CELULAR),CTAINDIV.FTC_TEL_FIJO),CTAINDIV.FTC_TEL_OFICINA) AS COLUMN_TELEFONO, CASE WHEN CTACONFI.FCC_VALOR_IND = '1' THEN 'Cuenta Vigente' ELSE 'Cuenta No Vigente' END AS COLUMN_ESTATUS
FROM CIERREN_ETL . TLSISGRAL_ETL_BUC CTAINDIV
INNER JOIN CIERREN.TTAFOGRAL_IND_CTA_INDV CTACONFI ON CTAINDIV.FTN_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL = CTACONFI.FTN_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL AND CTACONFI.FFN_ID_CONFIG_INDI = '2' AND CTACONFI.FTC_VIGENCIA = 1
CTAINDIV.FTN_NUM_CTA_INVDUAL = TRIM(#{cuenta,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
